title: Prodcyc 6 Inch Mini Chainsaw Brushless Cordless Chainsaw, Auto-Oil System 2x2.0Ah Batteries Portable Handheld Electric Chain Saw for Wood Cutting Garden Logging Trimming Branch
description: [Highly Efficient Cutting] The Prodcyc mini chainsaw utilizes a high-quality guide chain that has undergone deep hardening to ensure smooth cutting. With its powerful copper motor, this chainsaw can cut logs with a diameter of 6 inches in just 10 seconds (specific time may vary depending on wood size and hardness).

[Automatic Oiler] The standout feature of the Prodcyc mini chainsaw is its automatic oiler, which keeps the chain lubricated during operation, preventing sticking or slippage. This feature saves you time as there's no need to interrupt your work to repeatedly oil the chain. The translucent oil reservoir allows for easy monitoring of the fluid level, ensuring your tool remains properly oiled at all times.

[Portable Chainsaw] This chainsaw weighs just a little over 3 pounds, making it easy to hold and operate even for elderly individuals or women. Its compact size also enables it to fit into tight or awkward spaces that larger saws cannot, such as between tree branches or into brush piles.

[Safe and Reliable] Prodcyc's 6-inch mini chainsaw is equipped with a 120° splash guard to protect the user in the event of a kickback. Additionally, the safety button and trigger need to be pressed simultaneously to start the chainsaw. This excellent safety feature ensures that the saw will stop when it is least expected. We also offer cut resistant gloves for added safety.

[Large Capacity Battery Pack] Our portable chainsaw is equipped with two 2000mAh rechargeable high-capacity batteries, allowing for continuous operation of over 2 hours. The lithium-ion batteries feature self-protection mechanisms, including overload protection, over-current protection, high-temperature protection, and short-circuit protection. These safeguards effectively protect the battery from damage and provide longer battery life.

[What You Get] This 6-inch mini chainsaw comes complete with everything you need to start pruning, including 2 batteries, 1 charger, 2 chains, 1 screwdriver, 1 oil bottle, 1 file, 1 brush, and 1 pair of gloves, all neatly packaged in a carrying case.
[Perfect Gift] This mini portable chainsaw kit makes for the perfect gift for family, friends, fathers, husbands, new homeowners, DIY crafters, woodworkers, and craftsmen.

title: Koonie Compressed Air Duster,Koonie 15000mAh Cordless Air Duster&Vacuum 2 in 1 Powerful 77000RPM/11000PA 2 Speeds Electric Air Duster with Detachable Battery,for Computer/Keyboard,Car,Electronics

What’s more, this large capacity battery is detachable, good for indoor and outdoor activities, which can also be used as a mobile power source to charge your phone, tablet, etc.

[Cordless & Lightweight for Easy Maneuver] This electric air duster is only 1.12lb, make easy to maneuver. It's effectively for cleaning just as well as computers, keyboard, car, electronic device office, room corner, pet house etc. You will also like its cordless and ergonomic design, helps you move freely and save time for home and car cleaning. Just use it whenever and wherever you want.

[Great Substitute for Air Cans] The electric duster is nontoxic, safer than compressed air cans, do not build up any static charge, and can be used for a wide range of products. It cleans and dusts your computers, laptops, cars, interiors, furniture, cameras, medical equipment, vehicles and much more. Rechargeable air duster, No liquid is produced, let you abandon the compressed air tank. No need to buy compressed gas cans again again and again.

title: ASPERX Tire Inflator Portable Air Compressor, 160PSI & 4X Faster Portable Air Pump for Car Tires,Cordless Air inflator with Digital Pressure Gauge,Tire Pump with LED Light for Car Bike Motor Ball
description: 【4X Faster Inflation, 160PSI Super Precise】This portable air compressor is a must-have for your car, motorcycle, bicycle or home. This 4X faster, pressure up to 160 PSI inflator can inflate your car tires at a rate of 32 liters per minute, and can inflate a 185/65/R15 car tire from 26 psi to 36 psi in less than 1 minute. Save you precious time. It is your best companion on the road!

【4+N Smart Mode】AsperX portable tire inflator provides 4 preset inflation modes (SUV, car, bicycle, ball) for user convenience. In addition, the manual mode allows you to set the desired pressure between 4-160psi according to the inflator. When the preset pressure is reached, the tire inflator portable air compressor will automatically shut off, no need to check repeatedly.

【Rechargeable Battery】Built-in large-capacity rechargeable battery. Inflate your car tires anytime, anywhere. No more looking for a power source or dealing with tangled wires. It can work continuously for up to 35 minutes. The rechargeable portable tire inflator can also double as a portable power bank to charge your electronic devices, and is equipped with a built-in LED light, which provides convenience for you to inflate or change tires in the dark. It is a great solution for emergencies on the way.

【LCD Digital Display and Pressure Detection】This air pump for car tires adopts advanced smart chips and the highest quality air pump, and the accuracy is maintained at ±1%. This air compressor portable is equipped with a 3-inch LCD large screen, which displays the preset value and real-time pressure value. The tire pressure monitoring function can easily monitor the tire condition, which is convenient for you to observe and operate at any time.

【Convenient Design】This cordless tire inflator adopts a compact cordless design and comes with a mini storage bag, which can be easily stored in a car, backpack or bicycle rack. This compact tire inflator is equipped with an 18W Type-C input and a 10W USB output port. You can use a 5V/2A charging cable to charge your electronic devices. Perfect for road trips, camping or emergencies.

【Easy to Use】Simply connect the air hose to your car, switch the mode and press the "+" or "-" control button on the tire inflator, select the desired pressure, press the "Start" button on the electric air pump. Once the preset pressure is reached, the AsperX air pump will automatically shut off. No need to worry about over-inflation. The Cordless Car Tire Pump can easily reach all tires.

title: CEROBEAR Coffee Mug Warmer, Mug Warmer for Desk 3 Temperature Control 131 degree Fahrenheit /149 degree Fahrenheit /170 degree Fahrenheit , Smart Mug Warmer with Auto Shut Off for Coffee Milk Tea Beverage
description: 131℉/149℉/170℉ Temperature Settings Coffee Warmer: Provide more heat than other coffee mug warmers, say goodbye to lukewarm coffee! Our mug warmer is designed with 3 temperature settings, you can touch the “Temp Button” to keep or warm up your drink to 131℉(104℉-131℉), 149℉(131℉-149℉) and 170℉(149℉-170℉) . (Please Note that the heating temperature is affected by the environment and the thickness of the cup, use mugs with thin-wall and flat-bottom will get the best warming performance)

Portability and Compatibility: Compact design (4.9*5.7*0.98in/ 0.6lb) makes it easy to carry. You can take it with yourself on business trips or travel, and have a sip of hot coffee anytime. The oversize heating area 3.75in is suitable for most of mugs, such as glass cups, stainless steel cups and baby bottles. You can also use this mug warmer as a candle warmer to fill your room with fragrance.

Timer setting and Auto Shut Off: In order to prevent the danger caused by forgetting to take down the cup, our mug warmer has timing functions. You can touch the "timing button" , set it to be automatically turned off after 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12 hours. 4H auto Shut-off function, if you don't set the timing function, the warmer will automatically shut down after 4 hours by default

Gravity Induction Switch: There is a gravity induction switch on the bottom of the mug warmer. After you plug it in and press the switch, the coffee warmer will automatically turn on/off when you put /remove the cup. If the cup is not put back within 10 minutes, the coffee mug warmer will automatically shut down. This safety feature helps reduce the danger of forgetting to turn off the heater

Retro Gramophone Look and Digital Display: The digital display design can show the temperature and timing time of your choice. The wood grain texture combined with the retro gramophone look is sure to be attractive. CEROBEAR smart coffee warmer will be your best gift choice to show your care to your families, lover or friends on birthdays, Christmas, anniversaries or other special occasions

Safe & Durable: Our warmer has passed FCC certifications and passed 10000 tests to ensure its safety, please feel free to use it. The bottom and sides of the mug warmer are made of heat-resistant material, so don't worry about that it will burn your hands or damaging the table. It has great water resistance, don't worry if you accidentally splashing water on the warmer
